objects.text:
• Premium Polycarbonate Hardsided
• 8-Wheel 360° Smooth Glide System
• Stylish Forest Sunray Finish

product_details.name: MOKOBARA The Em Cabin Polycarbonate Hardsided Luggage | 8 Wheel Trolley Bag | Travel Suitcase for Men & Women (4AM Forest Sunray (Limited Edition))…
product_details.description: Item Weight: 6.6 pounds. Body Material: Polycarbonate. Finish Type: Glossy. Product Dimensions: 21.65 x 12.99 x 8.82 inches. Country of Origin: China. Color Name: 4AM Forest Sunray (Limited Edition). Material Type: Polycarbonate (PC). Size: One Size.

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek and modern travel-themed layout promoting a premium suitcase. The left half has a dark, split-tone background with structured horizontal dashed lines dividing sections. The headline (`heading`) uses a futuristic sans-serif font in white to emphasize a stylish travel experience. Directly underneath, the `tagline` in bold gold captures urgency. The key features of the product are neatly presented in a bulleted list (`description`). The price (`price`) stands out in oversized white text. A bold gold button (`cta_background` with `cta` label) invites action. At the bottom, a subtle brand name (`subheading`) is placed, while the right side showcases the suitcase in a realistic image (`product_image`), angled toward the viewer. Accents include decorative lines, circles, and squares in semi-transparent shades for added depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #1A1A1A
- Charcoal Grey: #2A2A2A
- Gold Yellow: #FFD700
- Pure White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish, modern suitcase with a dark olive green body accented by a vibrant yellow zipper strip, creating a bold contrast. The matte black handle and wheels complement the suitcase's sleek silhouette, grounding the bright yellow accent. The colors are thoughtfully balanced—deep green as the dominant color radiates sophistication (Hex: #1F2A1D), while the yellow accent (Hex: #FFD700) sharply stands out, adding energy and visibility. Black (Hex: #000000) detailing subtly emphasizes function without overpowering the design. For an advertisement banner, this color palette creates a professional yet dynamic appeal with a sophisticated blend of earthy and vibrant tones.
